text: Sanchaman Limboo (15 January 1947 â€“ 8 November 2020) was an Indian politician. He was the fourth Chief Minister of Sikkim from June 1994 to December 1994. He was a member of the Sikkim Sangram Parishad. Limboo died on 8 November 2020 after a long illness at the age of 73. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Indian politicians Category:Sikkim
title: Sanchaman Limboo
